name: PatentWorld Data Dictionary
description: Schema reference for all JSON data files served by PatentWorld. Data derived from USPTO PatentsView bulk download (February 2026). Data directories are organized by analytical topic; individual chapter pages may draw from multiple directories.

source_tables.g_patent: Core patent records (patent_id, patent_date, patent_type, num_claims)
source_tables.g_location_disambiguated: Geographic locations (state, city, country, latitude, longitude)

chapter_data_mapping._note: Maps each chapter URL slug to the data directory or directories it draws from. Chapters may use data from multiple directories.

system-patent-count.description: Patent counts by year and type, grant lag trends, pendency statistics

system-patent-quality.description: Quality metrics: claims, citations, scope, originality, generality, sleeping beauties, self-citation

system-patent-fields.description: CPC section distribution, field dynamics, class-level changes, technology S-curves, WIPO sector mapping

system-convergence.description: Technology convergence: cross-section patents, convergence pairs, friction maps

system-language.description: NLP topic modeling: 25 topics from 8.45M patent abstracts, entropy trends

system-patent-law.description: Patent law timeline: 21 legislative and judicial events, filing impact analysis

system-public-investment.description: Government-funded patent trends by agency, technology field heatmap

org-composition.description: Corporate vs. individual, domestic vs. foreign assignee composition by country

org-patent-count.description: Top assignee rankings, concentration ratios, design patents, blockbuster Lorenz curves

org-patent-quality.description: Citation impact, blockbuster rates, citation half-lives across top filers

org-patent-portfolio.description: Portfolio diversity, competitive proximity, JSD, technology pivots

org-company-profiles.description: Individual company profiles, quality metrics, design patents, patent mortality

inv-top-inventors.description: Top inventor rankings, productivity distribution, citation impact by prolificacy

inv-generalist-specialist.description: Generalist vs. specialist inventors, CPC breadth, quality comparison

inv-serial-new.description: First-time vs. serial inventors, experience cohorts, productivity trajectories

inv-gender.description: Gender trends in patenting, quality by gender, field composition

inv-team-size.description: Team size trends, solo vs. team quality, regression analysis

geo-domestic.description: State and city-level patent geography, technology specialization

geo-international.description: International inventor geography, quality by country, bilateral flows

mech-organizations.description: Organizational exploration-exploitation, co-patenting networks, citation flows

mech-inventors.description: Inventor collaboration networks, mobility event studies, international mobility

mech-geography.description: International co-invention trends and bilateral patent flows

3d-printing.description: Additive manufacturing domain: concentration, entry velocity, subfield diversity

ai-patents.description: Artificial intelligence domain: volume, growth, organizational rankings, quality metrics

green-innovation.description: Green innovation / climate technology domain analysis

deep-dive-overview.description: Cross-domain comparison metrics: volume, growth, concentration, quality, spillover

shared_data.computed: Pre-computed quality metrics (originality, generality, scope) for all patents
shared_data.explore: Interactive exploration data powering the Explore page search functionality

derived_metrics.originality: 1 − HHI of backward citation CPC sections. Range 0 to ~1.
derived_metrics.generality: 1 − HHI of forward citation CPC sections. Range 0 to ~1.
derived_metrics.blockbuster_rate: Share of patents in top 1% of 5-year forward citations within grant-year × CPC section cohort.
derived_metrics.dud_rate: Share of patents with zero 5-year forward citations.
derived_metrics.shannon_entropy: H = −Σ pᵢ log(pᵢ). Log₂ for topic modeling, ln for portfolio diversity.
derived_metrics.hhi: Σ sᵢ² × 10,000. Concentration index (0 = fragmented, 10,000 = monopoly).
derived_metrics.cr4: Combined patent share of top 4 organizations in a domain.
derived_metrics.exploration_score: Share of patents in CPC classes new to the firm in the prior 5 years.
derived_metrics.grant_lag: Days between application filing date and grant date.
derived_metrics.cohort_normalization: Patent citations divided by mean citations in same grant-year × CPC section.
derived_metrics.modified_gini: Directional concentration index derived from the Lorenz curve comparing blockbuster patent share to overall patent share. Positive values indicate large patent holders capture a disproportionate share of blockbuster patents; negative values indicate the reverse. Differs from the standard Gini coefficient (bounded [0, 1]) in that it measures relative concentration deviation and can take negative values.
